JUDGES: Ineta Ziemele;Ledi Bianku;Nona Tsotsoria;Päivi Hirvelä;Paul Mahoney;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , PERSON , is an NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . She was initially represented by PERSON and , subsequently , by PERSON , lawyers practising in GPE .
CARDINAL . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their then Agent , PERSON and , subsequently , by PERSON of ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was appointed , pursuant to a service contract ( kontratë shërbimi ) , as first secretary at ORG in GPE , GPE ( “ the Permanent Mission ” ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant went on maternity leave . She gave birth to a child on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Minister of ORG ( “ the Minister ” ) decided to terminate the applicant ’s employment as from DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Minister appointed the applicant to work as a specialist at ORG ( “ the Ministry ” ) in GPE . The applicant declined the offer .
CARDINAL . On DATE it was confirmed that the applicant had been divested of her diplomatic status and the benefits that derived from the exercise of her job as first secretary .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant challenged the Minister ’s decision of CARDINAL DATE before ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG partially accepted the applicant ’s civil action . It found that the termination of her employment while she was on maternity leave was in breach of Articles DATE and CARDINAL § CARDINAL of the Labour Code . It therefore annulled the Minister ’s decision of DATE and ordered the applicant ’s reinstatement . ORG further held that the reasons advanced by the applicant ’s employer for the termination of her employment , such as the commission of traffic offences in GPE , did not prevail over the legal guarantees afforded to women during the post - natal leave period . ORG decided that its decision should be provisionally enforced in accordance with LAW ( “ ORG ” ) . Having regard to the applicant ’s situation and the position she occupied , ORG ordered that , in addition to her reinstatement , the applicant ’s accreditation should be renewed and her benefits restored , including the grant of a residence permit , provision of accommodation , payment of salary and provision of medical examinations which had started in the applicant ’s place of residence on account of her employment ( paditësja vlerësohet se duhet të kthehet në një detyrë , e cila për nga rëndësia dhe specifikat e saj , implikon procedura të caktuara që lidhen me akreditimin dhe ripërfitimin e benefiteve ( leja e qendrimit , përfitimi i pagës , ekzaminimet mjekësore të nisura në vendin e qendrimit për shkak të punës ) ) . ORG appealed .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the lower court ’s decision .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Ministry appealed to ORG . The proceedings are currently pending before that court .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued a writ of execution in respect of its decision of CARDINAL DATE in accordance with Articles CARDINAL and CARDINAL of the ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiff unsuccessfully requested the ORG to comply voluntarily with ORG decision , as upheld by ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE , having regard to the ORG ’s failure to comply with ORG decision voluntarily , the bailiff decided to proceed with the mandatory enforcement thereof .
CARDINAL . On DATE , having regard to the ORG ’s failure to enforce the decision , the bailiff warned ORG that it would be fined in accordance with Article CARDINAL of the ORG .

CARDINAL . The Government submitted that on DATE , at the applicant ’s request , the bailiff decided to terminate the enforcement proceedings ( pushimin e ekzekutimit me kërkesë të kreditorit ) . It transpired from the bailiff ’s decision that the applicant had decided to transfer the file to another bailiff ’s office for supervision and enforcement ( për ta transferuar te një përmbarues tjetër ) .

CARDINAL . The Government further submitted that pursuant to the Minister ’s order no . CARDINAL of CARDINAL DATE the applicant had been appointed as first secretary , a position equivalent to the one she used to hold , at FAC GPE , GPE ( “ the Consulate General ” ) . The ORG ’s letter to ORG DATE , as submitted by the applicant , stated that “ the Ministry undertakes to pay PERSON only her monthly salary ( PERSON ... merr përsipër vetëm shpenzimet e pagës mujore ) ” .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG sent a letter to ORG , the relevant extracts of which read as follows :

“ Having regard to the circumstances in which the applicant , PERSON , has lodged an application with ORG about the delayed enforcement of ORG decision of CARDINAL DATE , as upheld by ORG decision of CARDINAL DATE , and the recent development whereby the applicant has already taken up employment as first secretary at ORG in GPE , we request ORG to contact PERSON and ask her to withdraw the application [ lodged ] with ORG , in so far as the ORG complied with its obligation to enforce the court decision by way of order no . CARDINAL of CARDINAL DATE , notwithstanding the applicant ’s withdrawal from the enforcement proceedings ( kërkojmë nga ana e Ministrisë së ORG të PERSON bëjë të mundur kontaktimin me Znj . PERSON dhe kërkimin prej PERSON heqjes dorë prej aplikimit në PERSON të Drejtave të Njeriut , për sa kohë detyrimet e shtetit ndaj ekzekutimit të vendimit gjyqësor të sipërpërmendur janë plotësuar nëpërmjet urdhrit nr . CARDINAL datë CARDINAL.CARDINAL.CARDINAL , pavarësisht prej heqjes dorë prej saj nga ekzekutimi i këtij të fundit ) . ”
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG sent a letter to ORG , the relevant extracts of which read as follows :

“ In their request for the protection of the ORG ’s interests , ORG request ORG , having regard to PERSON appointment as first secretary at ORG , [ to ask her ] to withdraw the application she has lodged with ORG ( Avokatura e Shtetit në kërkesën e saj për mbrojtjen e të drejtave të shtetit shqiptar kërkon nga ORG që duke u nisur nga kushtet ORG . PERSON është emëruar si PERSON e Parë në ORG të RSH - së në PERSON heq dorë nga e drejta e ankimit pranë GJEDNJ - së ) . ”
CARDINAL . On DATE , as part of her observations , the applicant submitted a statement , which she had signed on DATE , withdrawing her application from the ORG . The statement reads as follows :

“ Further to ORG Office ’s letter ... about my position concerning the application lodged by me , PERSON , before ORG , I inform [ you ] that I withdraw from pursuing this application before that court ( referuar shkresës së Avokaturës së Shtetit ... mbi qendrimin tim personal mbi çështjen e ngritur prej meje , PERSON , në PERSON , GPE , informoj se jap dorëheqjen për vazhdimin e kësaj çështje pranë kësaj gjykate ) . ”
CARDINAL . She maintained that the statement was made as a result of pressure exerted by the Government .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that the duration of maternity leave is thirtyfive days in respect of pre - natal leave and DATE in respect of post - natal leave . Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL states that when the period of post - natal leave is over , a woman may decide whether she wishes to return to work or benefit from social insurance entitlements . Under Article CARDINAL , in the event that a woman ’s employer terminates her employment during her pregnancy or following her return to work after the birth of a child , the employer must prove that the reason for the termination was not the woman ’s pregnancy or the birth of the child . Under LAW the termination of employment is void if it takes place during the period in which the woman is entitled to social insurance payments subsequent to the birth of a child .

CARDINAL . Under LAW a court decision may be provisionally enforced if it concerns payment of damages owing to unjust dismissal from work . Its provisional enforcement may also be ordered , if , owing to the delay in enforcement , the plaintiff may suffer significant damage which can not be remedied or if the enforcement would become impossible or would be made exceedingly difficult .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL provides that a court decision which orders provisional enforcement thereof constitutes an execution title . Under Article CARDINAL the execution title is enforceable at the creditor ’s request .
